room_title: Escape room "Professor Moriarty’s Gameroom" by The Great Escape Room in Providence
review: I went to The Great Escape Room today with my family of 5 and was paired with another group of 5 for the Game Room. We all had an excellent experience solving a series of puzzles and eventually escaped! The Game Room was very well put together and fun for everyone.

room_title: Escape room "Professor Moriarty’s Gameroom" by The Great Escape Room in Providence
review: My family and I did an escape room for my birthday and we had a blast. We did the Gameroom, and Amanda was our game master. She was fantastic, and we had so much fun because of her! We got paired with three other women and had a great time working together with them. I'm from PA but if I ever come back, I definitely want to do one of the other rooms with Amanda!
